Name: AltAnalyze
Description: AltAnalyze is a multi-functional and easy-to-use software package for automated single-cell and bulk gene and splicing analyses.

Publications.Title: Single-cell analysis of mixed-lineage states leading to a binary cell fate choice

Name: anchor
Description: Find bimodal, unimodal, and multimodal features in your data

Publications.Title: Single-Cell Alternative Splicing Analysis with Expedition Reveals Splicing Dynamics during Neuron Differentiation

Name: ascend
Description: Analysis of Single Cell Expresssion Normalisation and Differential Expression

Preprints.Title: ascend: R package for analysis of single cell RNA-seq data

Name: AUCell
Description: AUCell is an R-package to analyze the state of gene-sets in single-cell RNA-seq data (i.e. identify cells with active gene signatures).

Publications.Title: SCENIC: single-cell regulatory network inference and clustering

Preprints.Title: SCENIC: Single-Cell Regulatory Network Inference And Clustering

Name: BackSPIN
Description: Biclustering algorithm developed taking into account intrinsic features of single-cell RNA-seq experiments.

Publications.Title: Cell types in the mouse cortex and hippocampus revealed by single-cell RNA-seq

Name: badger
Description: Bayesian approach for detecting copy number alterations from single cell RNA-seq data

Name: BASIC
Description: BASIC is a semi-de novo assembly method to determine the full-length sequence of the BCR in single B cells from scRNA-seq data.

Publications.Title: BASIC: BCR assembly from single cells

Name: BASiCS
Description: Bayesian Analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data. Estimates cell-specific normalization constants. Technical variability is quantified based on spike-in genes. The total variability of the expression counts is decomposed into technical and biological components.

Publications.Title: BASiCS: Bayesian Analysis of Single-Cell Sequencing Data
Beyond comparisons of means: understanding changes in gene expression at the single-cell level

Preprints.Title: Robust expression variability testing reveals heterogeneous T cell responses

Name: BEARscc
Description: BEARscc is a noise estimation and injection tool that is designed to assess putative single-cell RNA-seq clusters in the context of experimental noise estimated by ERCC spike-in controls.

Preprints.Title: BEARscc determines robustness of single-cell clusters using simulated technical replicates

Name: bigSCale
Description: bigSCale is an analytical framework scalable to analyze millions of cells

Preprints.Title: bigSCale: An Analytical Framework for Big-Scale Single-Cell Data

Name: bonvoyage
Description: Transform percentage-based units into a 2d space to evaluate changes in distribution with both magnitude and direction.

Publications.Title: Single-Cell Alternative Splicing Analysis with Expedition Reveals Splicing Dynamics during Neuron Differentiation

Name: BPSC
Description: Beta-Poisson model for single-cell RNA-seq data analyses

Publications.Title: Beta-Poisson model for single-cell RNA-seq data analyses

Name: BraCeR
Description: BraCeR - reconstruction of B cell receptor sequences from single-cell RNA-seq data.

Preprints.Title: BraCeR: Reconstruction of B-cell receptor sequences and clonality inference from single-cell RNA-sequencing

Name: BranchedGP
Description: BranchedGP is a package for building Branching Gaussian process models in python, using TensorFlow and GPFlow.

Preprints.Title: BGP: Branched Gaussian processes for identifying gene-specific branching dynamics in single cell data

Name: BRIE
Description: BRIE (Bayesian regression for isoform estimate) is a Bayesian method to estimate isoform proportions from RNA-seq data.

Publications.Title: BRIE: transcriptome-wide splicing quantification in single cells

Preprints.Title: Transcriptome-wide splicing quantification in single cells

Name: BTR
Description: BTR is a model learning algorithm for reconstructing and training asynchronous Boolean models using single-cell expression data.

Publications.Title: BTR: training asynchronous Boolean models using single-cell expression data

Name: CALISTA
Description: CALISTA provides a user-friendly toolbox for the analysis of single cell expression data.

Preprints.Title: CALISTA: Clustering And Lineage Inference in Single-Cell Transcriptional Analysis

Name: cellAlign
Description: CellAlign is a tool for quantitative comparison of expression dynamics within or between single-cell trajectories.

Publications.Title: Alignment of single-cell trajectories to compare cellular expression dynamics

Name: Cellity
Description: Classification of low quality cells in scRNA-seq data using R

Publications.Title: Classification of low quality cells from single-cell RNA-seq data

Name: CellRanger
Description: Cell Ranger is a set of analysis pipelines that process Chromium single cell 3â€™ RNA-seq output to align reads, generate gene-cell matrices and perform clustering and gene expression analysis.

Publications.Title: Massively parallel digital transcriptional profiling of single cells

Name: CellRouter
Description: CellRouter is a multifaceted single-cell analysis platform that identifies complex cell-state transition trajectories by using flow networks to explore the subpopulation structure of multi-dimensional, single-cell omics data.

Publications.Title: Reconstruction of complex single-cell trajectories using CellRouter

Name: CellTree
Description: Cell population analysis and visualization from single cell RNA-seq data using a Latent Dirichlet Allocation model.

Publications.Title: CellTree: an R/bioconductor package to infer the hierarchical structure of cell populations from single-cell RNA-seq data

Name: CIDR
Description: Ultrafast and accurate clustering through imputation and dimensionality reduction for single-cell RNA-seq data.

Publications.Title: CIDR: Ultrafast and accurate clustering through imputation for single-cell RNA-seq data

Preprints.Title: CIDR: Ultrafast and accurate clustering through imputation for single-cell RNA-Seq data

Name: Citrus
Description: A normalization method to remove unwanted variation using both control and target genes.

Preprints.Title: Controlling for confounding effects in single cell RNA sequencing studies using both control and target genes

Name: clusterExperiment
Description: Functions for running and comparing many different clusterings of single-cell sequencing data. Meant to work with SCONE and slingshot.

Preprints.Title: clusterExperiment and RSEC: A Bioconductor package and framework for clustering of single-cell and other large gene expression datasets

Name: ClusterMine
Description: ClusterMine is a knowledge-integrated clustering approach to cluster samples based on gene expression profile.

Preprints.Title: ClusterMine: a Knowledge-integrated Clustering Approach based on Expression Profiles of Gene Sets

Name: countClust
Description: Clustering and Visualizing RNA-Seq Expression Data using Grade of Membership Models. Fits grade of membership models (GoM, also known as admixture models) to cluster RNA-seq gene expression count data, identifies characteristic genes driving cluster memberships, and provides a visual summary of the cluster memberships.

Name: CSMF
Description: CSMF (Common and Specific Matrix Factorization) is a MATLAB package to simultaneously extract common and specific patterns from the data of two or multiple biological interrelated conditions via matrix factorization.

Preprints.Title: Learning common and specific patterns from data of multiple interrelated biological scenarios with matrix factorization

Name: D3E
Description: D3E is a tool for identifying differentially-expressed genes, based on single-cell RNA-seq data. D3E consists of two modules: one for identifying differentially expressed (DE) genes, and one for fitting the parameters of a Poisson-Beta distribution.

Publications.Title: Discrete distributional differential expression (D3E) - a tool for gene expression analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data

Name: DECENT
Description: Differential Expression with Capture Efficiency AdjustmeNT for Single-Cell RNA-seq Data

Preprints.Title: DECENT: Differential Expression with Capture Efficiency AdjustmeNT for Single-Cell RNA-seq Data

Name: DeLorean
Description: R package to model time series accounting for noise in the temporal dimension. Specifically designed for single cell transcriptome experiments.

Publications.Title: Pseudotime estimation: deconfounding single cell time series

Name: demuxlet
Description: Genetic multiplexing of barcoded single cell RNA-seq

Publications.Title: Multiplexed droplet single-cell RNA-sequencing using natural genetic variation

Preprints.Title: Multiplexing droplet-based single cell RNA-sequencing using natural genetic barcodes

Name: DendroSplit
Description: DendroSplit, an interpretable framework for analyzing single-cell RNA-Seq datasets.

Preprints.Title: An Interpretable Framework for Clustering Single-Cell RNA-Seq Datasets

Name: DensityPath
Description: DensityPath can accurately and efficiently reconstruct the underlying cell developmental trajectories for large-scale scRNAseq data.

Preprints.Title: DensityPath: a level-set algorithm to visualize and reconstruct cell developmental trajectories for large-scale single-cell RNAseq data

Name: DESCEND
Description: DESCEND deconvolves the true gene expression distribution across cells for UMI scRNA-seq counts

Preprints.Title: Gene Expression Distribution Deconvolution in Single Cell RNA Sequencing

Name: DEsingle
Description: DEsingle is an R package for differential expression (DE) analysis of single-cell RNA-seq (scRNA-seq) data. It will detect differentially expressed genes between two groups of cells in a scRNA-seq raw read counts matrix.

Preprints.Title: DEsingle: A new method for single-cell differentially expressed genes detection and classification

Name: destiny
Description: Diffusion maps for single-cell RNA-seq.

Publications.Title: destiny: diffusion maps for large-scale single-cell data in R

Name: DIMMSC
Description: DIMMSC is an R package for clustering droplet-based single cell transcriptomic data. It uses Dirichlet mixture prior to characterize variations across different clusters.

Publications.Title: DIMM-SC: a Dirichlet mixture model for clustering droplet-based single cell transcriptomic data

Preprints.Title:
DIMM-SC: A Dirichlet mixture model for clustering droplet-based single
  cell transcriptomic data

Name: DISCO
Description: Distributions of Isoforms in Single Cell Omics

Name: DistMap
Description: DistMap can be used to spatially map single cell RNA sequencing data by using an existing reference database of in situs.

Publications.Title: TheDrosophilaembryo at single-cell transcriptome resolution

Name: DPT
Description: Our DPT software implementations make it possible to reconstruct the developmental progression of cells and identify transient or metastable states, branching decisions and differentiation endpoints.

Publications.Title: Diffusion pseudotime robustly reconstructs lineage branching

Name: DrImpute
Description: DrImpute is an R package for imputing dropout events in single-cell RNA-sequencing data.

Preprints.Title: DrImpute: Imputing dropout events in single cell RNA sequencing data

Name: dropbead
Description: It offers a quick and straightfoward way to explore and perform basic analysis of single cell sequencing data coming from droplet sequencing, such as Drop-seq.

Preprints.Title: Cell fixation and preservation for droplet-based single-cell transcriptomics

Name: dropClust
Description: Efficient clustering of ultra-large scRNA-seq data

Preprints.Title: dropClust: Efficient clustering of ultra-large scRNA-seq data

Name: dropEst
Description: Pipeline for estimating molecular count matrices for droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq measurements.

Preprints.Title: Accurate estimation of molecular counts in droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq experiments

Name: DropLasso
Description: Dropout Lasso, a robust variant of Lasso for data with dropout.

Preprints.Title: DropLasso: A robust variant of Lasso for single cell RNA-seq data

Name: dropletUtils
Description: Package for handling droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq data

Name: dropSeqPipe
Description: This pipeline is based on snakemake and the dropseq tools provided by the McCarroll Lab. It allows to go from raw data of your dropSeq/scrbSeq experiment until the final count matrix with QC plots along the way.

Name: dropsim
Description: This is an R package for quickly simulating single cell RNAseq read count data.

Name: DrSeq2
Description: Quality control and analysis pipeline for parallel single cell transcriptome and epigenome data

Publications.Title: Dr.seq2: A quality control and analysis pipeline for parallel single cell transcriptome and epigenome data

Name: DTWScore
Description: Transcriptional heterogeneity analysis for time-series single-cell RNA-seq data

Publications.Title: DTWscore: differential expression and cell clustering analysis for time-series single-cell RNA-seq data

Name: dynverse
Description: dynverse is created to support the development, execution, and benchmarking of trajectory inference methods.

Preprints.Title: A comparison of single-cell trajectory inference methods: towards more accurate and robust tools

Name: ECLAIR
Description: ECLAIR stands for Ensemble Clustering for Lineage Analysis, Inference and Robustness. Robust and scalable inference of cell lineages from gene expression data.

Preprints.Title: Robust Lineage Reconstruction from High-Dimensional Single-Cell Data

Name: embeddr
Description: Embeddr creates a reduced dimensional representation of the gene space using a high-variance gene correlation graph and laplacian eigenmaps. It then fits a smooth pseudotime trajectory using principal curves.

Preprints.Title: Laplacian eigenmaps and principal curves for high resolution pseudotemporal ordering of single-cell RNA-seq profiles

Name: ESAT
Description: The ESAT toolkit is designed for expression analysis of Digital expression (DGE) libraries that target transcript "ends". ESAT takes a set of alignment files (SAM or BAM) with genome alignment coordinates, a file containing transcript coordinates (BED or text file) and outputs read counts for each transcript provided.

Publications.Title: End Sequence Analysis Toolkit (ESAT) expands the extractable information from single-cell RNA-seq data

Name: Falco
Description: A Cloud-based Genetic Feature Quantification Analysis Tool

Publications.Title: Falco: a quick and flexible single-cell RNA-seq processing framework on the cloud

Preprints.Title: Falco: A quick and flexible single-cell RNA-seq processing framework on the cloud

Name: FastProject
Description: Here we present FastProject, a software package for two-dimensional visualization of single cell data, which utilizes a plethora of projection methods and provides a way to systematically investigate the biological relevance of these low dimensional representations by incorporating domain knowledge.

Publications.Title: FastProject: a tool for low-dimensional analysis of single-cell RNA-Seq data

Name: FateID
Description: FateID is a random forests-based algorithm for the quantification of the fate biases of multipotent progenitors, i. e. the probabilities of differentiating towards particular cell lineages.

Preprints.Title: FateID infers cell fate bias in multipotent progenitors from single-cell RNA-seq data

Name: flotilla
Description: Reproducible machine learning analysis of gene expression and alternative splicing data

Name: FORKS
Description: Finding Orderings Robustly using K-means and Steiner trees (FORKS), an algorithm that pseudo-temporally orders cells and thereby infers bifurcating state trajectories.

Preprints.Title: FORKS: Finding Orderings Robustly using K-means and Steiner trees

Name: GiniClust
Description: GiniClust is a clustering method implemented in Python and R for detecting rare cell-types from large-scale single-cell gene expression data.

Publications.Title: GiniClust: detecting rare cell types from single-cell gene expression data with Gini index

Name: GiniClust2
Description: GiniClust2 is a clustering algorithm for the simultaneous detection of common and rare cell types from single-cell gene expression data.

Preprints.Title: A cluster-aware, weighted ensemble clustering method for cell-type detection

Name: GPfates
Description: Model transcriptional cell fates as mixtures of Gaussian Processes

Publications.Title: Single-cell RNA-seq and computational analysis using temporal mixture modeling resolves TH1/TFHfate bifurcation in malaria

Preprints.Title: Temporal mixture modelling of single-cell RNA-seq data resolves a CD4+ T cell fate bifurcation

Name: GPseudoRank
Description: GPseudoRank, an algorithm sampling from a posterior distribution of pseudo-orders instead of pseudotimes, avoiding the exploration of pseudotime assignments that all map to the same ordering.

Preprints.Title: GPseudoRank: a permutation sampler for single cell orderings

Name: Granatum
Description: This is a graphical single-cell RNA-seq (scRNA-seq) analysis pipeline for genomics scientists.

Preprints.Title: Granatum: a graphical single-cell RNA-Seq analysis pipeline for genomics scientists

Name: GrandPrix
Description: GrandPrix is a python package implementing the approach described in the paper "GrandPrix: Scaling up the Bayesian GPLVM for single-cell data" .

Preprints.Title: GrandPrix: Scaling up the Bayesian GPLVM for single-cell data

Name: GRM
Description: Normalization and noise reduction for singlecell RNA-seq experiments

Publications.Title: Normalization and noise reduction for single cell RNA-seq experiments

Name: GRNVBEM
Description: Gene Regulatory Network (GRN) inference from time series or pseudo-time series data using a first-order autoregressive moving average (AR1MA1) model within a variational Bayesian Expectation-Maximization (VBEM) framework.

Publications.Title: A Bayesian framework for the inference of gene regulatory networks from time and pseudo-time series data

Name: HocusPocus
Description: Basic PCA-based workflow for analysis and plotting of single cell RNA-seq data.

Name: HopLand
Description: Single-cell pseudotime recovery using continuous Hopfield network based modeling of Waddingtonâ€™s epigenetic landscape

Publications.Title: HopLand: single-cell pseudotime recovery using continuous Hopfield network-based modeling of Waddingtonâ€™s epigenetic landscape

Name: IA-SVA
Description: Iteratively Adjusted Surrogate Variable Analysis (IA-SVA) is a statistical framework to uncover hidden sources of variation even when these sources are correlated with the biological variable of interest.

Preprints.Title: A robust statistical framework to detect multiple sources of hidden variation in single-cell transcriptomes

Name: ideXplorer
Description: indeXplorer is a web-based App written with shiny for the explorative analysis of index-sorted, single-cell transcriptomic data.

Publications.Title: Demystifying blood stem cell fates

Name: inferCNV
Description: Infer Copy Number Variation using Single-cell RNA-Seq Expression Data.

Publications.Title: Single-cell RNA-seq highlights intratumoral heterogeneity in primary glioblastoma

Name: iscandar
Description: Iscandar (Interactive Single Cell Data Analysis Report) is a set of python scripts and html/javascript files used to create interactive report for single cell rna-seq analysis.

Name: iSEE
Description: The SummarizedExplorer package aims to provide an interactive user interface for exploring data in SummarizedExperiment objects. Particular focus will be given to single-cell data in the SingleCellExperiment derived class.

Name: ISOP
Description: ISOform-level expression Patterns in single-cell RNA-sequencing data.

Publications.Title: Isoform-level gene expression patterns in single-cell RNA-sequencing data

Preprints.Title: Isoform-level gene expression patterns in single-cell RNA-sequencing data

Name: k-branches
Description: The main idea behind the K-Branches method is to identify regions of interest (branching regions and tips) in differentiation trajectories of single cells.

Preprints.Title: Model-based branching point detection in single-cell data by K-Branches clustering

Name: kBET
Description: An R package to provide a test for batch effects in high-dimensional single-cell RNA sequencing data.

Preprints.Title: Assessment of batch-correction methods for scRNA-seq data with a new test metric

Name: knn_smooth
Description: Smoothing is performed by first identifying the nearest neighbors of each cell in a step-wise fashion, based on variance-stabilized and partially smoothed expression profiles, and then aggregating their transcript counts.

Preprints.Title: K-nearest neighbor smoothing for high-throughput single-cell RNA-Seq data

Name: LEAP
Description: Constructing Gene Co-Expression Networks for Single-Cell RNA-Sequencing Data Using Pseudotime Ordering.

Publications.Title: LEAP: constructing gene co-expression networks for single-cell RNA-sequencing data using pseudotime ordering

Name: Linnorm
Description: Linnorm is an R package for the analysis of RNA-seq, scRNA-seq, ChIP-seq count data or any large scale count data.

Name: M3Drop
Description: R package providing functions for fitting a modified Michaelis-Menten (MM) equation to the pattern of dropouts observed in a single-cell sequencing experiment.

Preprints.Title: Modelling dropouts for feature selection in scRNASeq experiments

Name: MAGIC
Description: Markov Affinity-based Graph Imputation of Cells (MAGIC)

Preprints.Title: MAGIC: A diffusion-based imputation method reveals gene-gene interactions in single-cell RNA-sequencing data

Name: MAST
Description: Model-based Analysis of Single-cell Transcriptomics (MAST) fits a two-part, generalized linear models that are specially adapted for bimodal and/or zero-inflated single cell gene expression data.

Publications.Title: MAST: a flexible statistical framework for assessing transcriptional changes and characterizing heterogeneity in single-cell RNA sequencing data

Name: MATCHER
Description: Manifold Alignment to Characterize Experimental Relationships (MATCHER)

Publications.Title: MATCHER: manifold alignment reveals correspondence between single cell transcriptome and epigenome dynamics

Name: MCXpress
Description: MCA is a dimensionality reduction technique that allows the representation of both individuals (cells) and the variables (genes) within the same Euclidean space, thus allowing the simultaneous identification of subpopulations of cells and their gene signatures.

Name: MERLoT
Description: MERLot is a tool that can reconstruct the lineage tree topology that explains the emergence of different cell types from a progenitor population.

Preprints.Title: Reconstructing complex lineage trees from scRNA-seq data using MERLoT

Name: MetaNeighbour
Description: MetaNeighbor: a method to rapidly assess cell type identity using both functional and random gene sets

Publications.Title: Characterizing the replicability of cell types defined by single cell RNA-sequencing data using MetaNeighbor

Preprints.Title: Addressing the looming identity crisis in single cell RNA-seq

Name: MFA
Description: mfa is an R package implementing Gibbs sampling for a Bayesian hierarchichal mixture of factor analysers for inference of bifurcations in single-cell data.

Publications.Title: Probabilistic modeling of bifurcations in single-cell gene expression data using a Bayesian mixture of factor analyzers

Name: Monocle
Description: Differential expression and time-series analysis for single-cell RNA-Seq.

Publications.Title: The dynamics and regulators of cell fate decisions are revealed by pseudotemporal ordering of single cells
Single-cell mRNA quantification and differential analysis with Census
Reversed graph embedding resolves complex single-cell trajectories

Preprints.Title: Reversed graph embedding resolves complex single-cell developmental trajectories

Name: Mpath
Description: Mpath: an algorithm for constructing multi-branching cell lineages from single-cell data

Publications.Title: Mpath maps multi-branching single-cell trajectories revealing progenitor cell progression during development

Name: MPSSC
Description: MPSSC is a novel spectral clustering framework that imposes sparse structures on a target matrix.

Publications.Title: Spectral clustering based on learning similarity matrix

Name: MUDAN
Description: Multi-sample Unified Discriminant ANalysis

Name: netSmooth
Description: A Network smoothing based method for single cell RNA-seq

Preprints.Title: netSmooth: Network-smoothing based imputation for single cell RNA-seq

Name: NetworkInference
Description: NetworkInference is a package for inferring (undirected) networks, given a set of measurements for each node.

Publications.Title: Gene Regulatory Network Inference from Single-Cell Data Using Multivariate Information Measures

Name: OEFinder
Description: Identify ordering effect genes in single cell RNA-seq data. OEFinder shiny impelemention depends on packages shiny, shinyFiles, gdata, and EBSeq.

Publications.Title: OEFinder: a user interface to identify and visualize ordering effects in single-cell RNA-seq data

Name: Oscope
Description: Oscope: a statistical pipeline for identifying oscillatory genes in unsynchronized single cell RNA-seq experiments.

Publications.Title: Oscope identifies oscillatory genes in unsynchronized single-cell RNA-seq experiments

Name: Ouija
Description: Incorporate prior information into single-cell trajectory (pseudotime) analyses using Bayesian nonlinear factor analysis.

Preprints.Title: A descriptive marker gene approach to single-cell pseudotime inference

Name: ouijaflow
Description: ouijaflow implements the probabilistic single-cell pseudotime model Ouija in Edward and Tensorflow, allowing scalable inference on large single-cell datasets. Inference is performed using reparametrization gradient variational inference.

Name: Outrigger
Description: Outrigger is a program to calculate alternative splicing scores of RNA-Seq data based on junction reads and a de novo, custom annotation created with a graph database, especially made for single-cell analyses.

Publications.Title: Single-Cell Alternative Splicing Analysis with Expedition Reveals Splicing Dynamics during Neuron Differentiation

Name: ParaDPMM
Description: Parallelized Inference for Single Cell Transcriptomic Clustering with Split Merge Sampling on DPMM Model

Preprints.Title: Parallelized Inference for Single Cell Transcriptomic Clustering with Split Merge Sampling on DPMM Model

Name: PBA
Description: Population balance analysis (PBA) relates the observed states of a system to its steady-state dynamics by applying the law of population balance.

Preprints.Title: Fundamental limits on dynamic inference from single cell snapshots

Name: pcaReduce
Description: Hierarchical clustering of single cell transcriptional profiles

Publications.Title: pcaReduce: hierarchical clustering of single cell transcriptional profiles

Name: pCMF
Description: A probabilistic Count Matrix Factorization (pCMF) approach for single-cell expression data analysis, that relies on a sparse Gamma-Poisson factor model.

Preprints.Title: Probabilistic Count Matrix Factorization for Single Cell Expression Data Analysis

Name: pCreode
Description: The term creode was coined by C.H. Waddington, combining the Greek words for â€œnecessaryâ€ and â€œpathâ€ to describe the cell state transitional trajectories that define cell fate specification. Our algorithm aims to identify consensus routes from relatively noisy single-cell data and thus we named this algorithm p- (putative) Creode.

Publications.Title: Unsupervised Trajectory Analysis of Single-Cell RNA-Seq and Imaging Data Reveals Alternative Tuft Cell Origins in the Gut

Name: PHATE
Description: PHATE is a tool for visualizing high dimensional single-cell data with natural progressions or trajectories.

Preprints.Title: Visualizing Transitions and Structure for High Dimensional Data Exploration

Name: PhenoPath
Description: PhenoPath learns genomic trajectories (pseudotimes) in the presence of heterogenous environmental and genetic backgrounds encoded as additional covariates and identifies interactions between the trajectories and covariates.

Preprints.Title: Uncovering genomic trajectories with heterogeneous genetic and environmental backgrounds across single-cells and populations

Name: PIVOT
Description: PIVOT facilitates fast and interactive RNA-Seq data analysis and visualization.

Publications.Title: PIVOT: platform for interactive analysis and visualization of transcriptomics data

Preprints.Title: PIVOT: Platform for Interactive Analysis and Visualization of Transcriptomics Data

Name: PoissonUMIs
Description: R package providing functions for fitting, analyzing and visualizing single-cell RNASeq data which has been quantified by counting UMIs while accounting for different sequencing depths/detection rates between cells.

Name: powsimR
Description: Power analysis for bulk and single cell RNA-seq experiments

Preprints.Title: powsimR: Power analysis for bulk and single cell RNA-seq experiments

Name: PROSSTT
Description: PROSSTT (PRObabilistic Simulations of ScRNA-seq Tree-like Topologies) is a package with code for the simulation of scRNAseq data for dynamic processes such as cell differentiation.

Preprints.Title: PROSSTT: probabilistic simulation of single-cell RNA-seq data for complex differentiation processes

Name: pseudodynamics
Description: Pseudodynamics provides a dynamic (timeÂ­ resolved) description of a population as a density over a cell state coordinate.

Preprints.Title: Beyond pseudotime: Following T-cell maturation in single-cell RNAseq time series

Name: pseudogp
Description: pseudogp is an R package for Bayesian inference of Gaussian Process Latent Variable models learning pseudotimes from single-cell RNA-seq.

Preprints.Title: Order under uncertainty: robust differential expression analysis using probabilistic models for pseudotime inference

Name: RaceID2
Description: RaceID2 is an advanced version of RaceID, an algorithm for the identification of rare and abundant cell types from single cell transcriptome data.

Publications.Title: De Novo Prediction of Stem Cell Identity using Single-Cell Transcriptome Data

Name: RAFSIL
Description: Implements a two-step procedure using feature construction and random forest based similarity learning for single cell RNA sequencing data.

Preprints.Title: Random forest based similarity learning for single cell RNA sequencing data

Name: RCA
Description: RCA, short for Reference Component Analysis, is an R package for robust clustering analysis of single cell RNA sequencing data (scRNAseq).

Publications.Title: Reference component analysis of single-cell transcriptomes elucidates cellular heterogeneity in human colorectal tumors

Name: reCAT
Description: reCAT is a modelling framework for unsynchronized single-cell transcriptome data that can reconstruct a high-resolution cell cycle time-series.

Publications.Title: Reconstructing cell cycle pseudo time-series via single-cell transcriptome data

Name: SAFE
Description: SAFE-clustering is a flexible, accurate and robust method for clustering scRNA-seq data.

Preprints.Title: SAFE-clustering: Single-cell Aggregated (From Ensemble) Clustering for Single-cell RNA-seq Data

Name: SAIC
Description: Single cell RNA-seq analysis with iterative clustering (SAIC) is a method to identify subgroups and signature genes in single cell RNA-seq data.

Publications.Title: SAIC: an iterative clustering approach for analysis of single cell RNA-seq data

Name: sake
Description: Single-cell RNA-Seq Analysis and Klustering Evaluation. The aim of sake is to provide a user-friendly tool for easy analysis of NGS Single-Cell transcriptomic data.

Name: SAMstrt
Description: Statistical test for differential expression in single-celltranscriptome with spike-in normalization

Publications.Title: SAMstrt: statistical test for differential expression in single-cell transcriptome with spike-in normalization

Name: SAUCIE
Description: SAUCIE (Sparse Autoencoder for Unsupervised Clustering, Imputation, and Embedding), simultaneously performs several key tasks for single-cell data analysis including 1) clustering, 2) batch correction, 3) visualization, and 4) denoising/imputation.

Preprints.Title: Exploring Single-Cell Data with Multitasking Deep Neural Networks

Name: SAVER
Description: SAVER (Single-cell Analysis Via Expression Recovery) implements a regularized regression prediction and empirical Bayes method to recover the true gene expression profile in noisy and sparse single-cell RNA-seq data.

Preprints.Title: Gene Expression Recovery For Single Cell RNA Sequencing

Name: SBDN
Description: Implements the sparse Bayesian dynamic network model

Preprints.Title: Sparse Bayesian dynamic network models, with genomics applications

Name: SC3
Description: SC3 is an interactive tool for the unsupervised clustering of cells from single cell RNA-Seq experiments.

Publications.Title: SC3: consensus clustering of single-cell RNA-seq data

Preprints.Title: SC3 - consensus clustering of single-cell RNA-Seq data

Name: SCALE
Description: Allele-Specific Expression by Single-Cell RNA Sequencing

Publications.Title: SCALE: modeling allele-specific gene expression by single-cell RNA sequencing

Preprints.Title: Modeling allele-specific gene expression by single-cell RNA sequencing

Name: Scanpy
Description: Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression data.

Publications.Title: SCANPY: large-scale single-cell gene expression data analysis

Preprints.Title: Scanpy for analysis of large-scale single-cell gene expression data
Graph abstraction reconciles clustering with trajectory inference through a topology preserving map of single cells

Name: Scater
Description: Scater places an emphasis on tools for quality control, visualisation and pre-processing of data before further downstream analysis, filling a useful niche between raw RNA-sequencing count or transcripts-per-million data and more focused downstream modelling tools such as monocle, scLVM, SCDE, edgeR, limma and so on.

Publications.Title: Scater: pre-processing, quality control, normalization and visualization of single-cell RNA-seq data in R

Preprints.Title: scater: pre-processing, quality control, normalisation and visualisation of single-cell RNA-seq data in R

Name: scDD
Description: scDD (Single-Cell Differential Distributions) is a framework to identify genes with different expression patterns between biological groups of interest. In addition to traditional differential expression, it can detect differences that are more complex and subtle than a mean shift.

Publications.Title: A statistical approach for identifying differential distributions in single-cell RNA-seq experiments

Preprints.Title: scDD: A statistical approach for identifying differential distributions in single-cell RNA-seq experiments

Name: SCDE
Description: Differential expression using error models and overdispersion-based identification of important gene sets.

Publications.Title: Bayesian approach to single-cell differential expression analysis

Name: scdiff
Description: SCDIFF is a python package designed to analyze the cell differentiation process using time-series single cell RNA-seq data.

Publications.Title: Reconstructing differentiation networks and their regulation from time series single-cell expression data

Name: SCell
Description: SCell is an integrated software tool for quality filtering, normalization, feature selection, iterative dimensionality reduction, clustering and the estimation of gene-expression gradients from large ensembles of single-cell RNA-seq datasets. SCell is open source, and implemented with an intuitive graphical interface.

Publications.Title: SCell: integrated analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data

Name: SCENIC
Description: SCENIC is a tool to infer Gene Regulatory Networks and cell types from single-cell RNA-seq data.

Publications.Title: SCENIC: single-cell regulatory network inference and clustering

Preprints.Title: SCENIC: Single-Cell Regulatory Network Inference And Clustering

Name: SCENT
Description: scent is an R-package for analysis of single-cell RNA-Seq data. It uses single-cell entropy to help analyse and interpret such data.

Publications.Title: Single-cell entropy for accurate estimation of differentiation potency from a cellâ€™s transcriptome

Preprints.Title: Single-cell entropy for quantification of differentiation potency from a cell's transcriptome

Name: scEpath
Description: scEpath is a novel computational method for quantitatively measuring developmental potency and plasticity of single cells and transition probabilities between cell states, and inferring lineage relationships and pseudotemporal ordering from single-cell gene expression data.

Publications.Title: scEpath: energy landscape-based inference of transition probabilities and cellular trajectories from single-cell transcriptomic data

Name: scFBA
Description: scFBA is a suite of MATLAB functions to perform a single-cell Flux Balance Analysis (scFBA).

Preprints.Title: Integration of single-cell RNA-seq data into metabolic models to characterize tumour cell populations

Name: SCIMITAR
Description: SCIMITAR provides a variety of tools to analyze trajectory maps of single-cell measurements.

Preprints.Title: Tracing co-regulatory network dynamics in noisy, single-cell transcriptome trajectories

Name: scImpute
Description: scImpute is developed to accurately and robustly impute the dropout values in scRNA-seq data

Publications.Title: An accurate and robust imputation method scImpute for single-cell RNA-seq data

Preprints.Title: scImpute: Accurate And Robust Imputation For Single Cell RNA-Seq Data

Name: scLVM
Description: scLVM is a modelling framework for single-cell RNA-seq data that can be used to dissect the observed heterogeneity into different sources, thereby allowing for the correction of confounding sources of variation. scLVM was primarily designed to account for cell-cycle induced variations in single-cell RNA-seq data where cell cycle is the primary soure of variability.

Publications.Title: Computational analysis of cell-to-cell heterogeneity in single-cell RNA-sequencing data reveals hidden subpopulations of cells

Name: scmap
Description: scmap is a method for projecting cells from a scRNA-seq experiment on to the cell-types identified in a different experiment.

Preprints.Title: scmap - A tool for unsupervised projection of single cell RNA-seq data

Name: scMCA
Description: Accurately defines cell types based on single-cell digital expression.

Publications.Title: Mapping the Mouse Cell Atlas by Microwell-Seq

Name: SCNorm
Description: A quantile regression based approach for robust normalization of single cell RNA-seq data.

Publications.Title: SCnorm: robust normalization of single-cell RNA-seq data

Preprints.Title: SCnorm: A quantile-regression based approach for robust normalization of single-cell RNA-seq data

Name: SCODE
Description: SCODE : an efficient regulatory network inference algorithm from single-cell RNA-Seq during differentiation.

Preprints.Title: SCODE: An efficient regulatory network inference algorithm from single-cell RNA-Seq during differentiation

Name: scone
Description: SCONE (Single-Cell Overview of Normalized Expression), a package for single-cell RNA-seq data quality control (QC) and normalization. This data-driven framework uses summaries of expression data to assess the efficacy of normalization workflows.

Preprints.Title: Performance Assessment and Selection of Normalization Procedures for Single-Cell RNA-Seq

Name: SCORPIUS
Description: SCORPIUS an unsupervised approach for inferring developmental chronologies from single-cell RNA sequencing data.

Preprints.Title: SCORPIUS improves trajectory inference and identifies novel modules in dendritic cell development

Name: SCOUP
Description: Uses probabilistic model based on the Ornstein-Uhlenbeck process to analyze single-cell expression data during differentiation.

Name: SCPattern
Description: A statistical approach to identify and classify expression changes in single cell RNA-seq experiments with ordered conditions.

Preprints.Title: SCPattern: A statistical approach to identify and classify expression changes in single cell RNA-seq experiments with ordered conditions

Name: scphaser
Description: scphaser is an R package for haplotype phasing using single-cell RNA-seq data.

Publications.Title: scphaser: haplotype inference using single-cell RNA-seq data

Name: scPipe
Description: a pipeline for single cell RNA-seq data analysis

Preprints.Title: scPipe: a flexible R/Bioconductor preprocessing pipeline for single-cell RNA-sequencing data

Name: scploid
Description: To detect aneuploidies from scRNA-sequencing data we computed, for a defined group of cells, a score for each chromosome-cell pair that measures whether the expression level of genes in that chromosome differs substantially from other cells.

Publications.Title: Mosaic autosomal aneuploidies are detectable from single-cell RNAseq data

Name: scran
Description: This package implements a variety of low-level analyses of single-cell RNA-seq data. Methods are provided for normalization of cell-specific biases, pool-based norms to estimate size factors, assignment of cell cycle phase, and detection of highly variable and significantly correlated genes.

Publications.Title: Pooling across cells to normalize single-cell RNA sequencing data with many zero counts

Preprints.Title: Correcting batch effects in single-cell RNA sequencing data by matching mutual nearest neighbours.

Name: SCRL
Description: This is the SCRL toolkit developed for learning meaningful representations for scRNA-seq data by integrating multiple source of network information.

Publications.Title: Network embedding-based representation learning for single cell RNA-seq data

Name: scRutiNy
Description: scRutiNy is comprised of two modules: RNAscrutiny.MatriSeq for simulation and RNAscrutiny.RegNetInference for inferring gene networks

Name: scTCRseq
Description: This project is an implementation of a pipeline for Single-cell RNAseq package for recovering TCR data in python.

Name: scTDA
Description: scTDA is an object oriented python library for topological data analysis of high-throughput single-cell RNA-seq data. It includes tools for the preprocessing, analysis, and exploration of single-cell RNA-seq data based on topological representations.

Publications.Title: Single-cell topological RNA-seq analysis reveals insights into cellular differentiation and development

Name: SCUBA
Description: SCUBA stands for "Single-cell Clustering Using Bifurcation Analysis." SCUBA is a novel computational method for extracting lineage relationships from single-cell gene expression data, and modeling the dynamic changes associated with cell differentiation.

Publications.Title: Bifurcation analysis of single-cell gene expression data reveals epigenetic landscape

Name: scVEGs
Description: scVEGs is a novel algorithm for single-cell RNA-seq (scRNA-seq) data to determine significant variably expressed genes (VEGs) using a gene expression variation model (GEVM).

Publications.Title: Detection of high variability in gene expression from single-cell RNA-seq profiling

Name: SEGtool
Description: SEGtool is an R package with self-adaptive function and high accuracy for specifically expressed gene (SEG, also known as tissue specific gene) detection.

Publications.Title: SEGtool: a specifically expressed gene detection tool and applications in human tissue and single-cell sequencing data

Name: SEPA
Description: SEPA provides convenient functions for users to assign genes into different gene expression patterns such as constant, monotone increasing and increasing then decreasing. SEPA then performs GO enrichment analysis to analysis the functional roles of genes with same or similar patterns.

Name: Seurat
Description: It contains easy-to-use implementations of commonly used analytical techniques, including the identification of highly variable genes, dimensionality reduction (PCA, ICA, t-SNE), standard unsupervised clustering algorithms (density clustering, hierarchical clustering, k-means), and the discovery of differentially expressed genes and markers.

Publications.Title: Spatial reconstruction of single-cell gene expression data

Preprints.Title: Integrated analysis of single cell transcriptomic data across conditions, technologies, and species

Name: Sharq
Description: A versatile preprocessing pipeline designed to work with plate-based 3'-end protocols that include Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMIs)

Preprints.Title: Sharq, a versatile preprocessing and QC pipeline for Single Cell RNA-seq

Name: SIMLR
Description: Single-cell Interpretation via Multi-kernel LeaRning which learns an appropriate distance metric from the data for dimension reduction, clustering and visualization.

Publications.Title: Visualization and analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data by kernel-based similarity learning
SIMLR: A Tool for Large-Scale Genomic Analyses by Multi-Kernel Learning

Preprints.Title: Visualization and analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data by kernel-based similarity learning

Name: sincell
Description: Existing computational approaches for the assessment of cell-state hierarchies from single-cell data might be formalized under a general workflow composed of i) a metric to assess cell-to-cell similarities (combined or not with a dimensionality reduction step), and ii) a graph-building algorithm (optionally making use of a cells-clustering step). Sincell R package implements a methodological toolbox allowing flexible workflows under such framework.

Publications.Title: Sincell: an R/Bioconductor package for statistical assessment of cell-state hierarchies from single-cell RNA-seq: Fig. 1.

Preprints.Title: Sincell: Bioconductor package for the statistical assessment of cell-state hierarchies from single-cell RNA-seq data

Name: SINCERA
Description: R-based pipeline for single-cell analysis including clustering and visualization.

Publications.Title: SINCERA: A Pipeline for Single-Cell RNA-Seq Profiling Analysis
Single-Cell Transcriptome Analysis Using SINCERA Pipeline

Name: SINCERITIES
Description: SINCERITIES is a tool for inferring gene regulatory networks from time-stamped cross-sectional single cell transcriptional expression profiles.

Publications.Title: SINCERITIES: inferring gene regulatory networks from time-stamped single cell transcriptional expression profiles

Name: SinCHet
Description: a MATLAB GUI toolbox for Single Cell Heterogeneity analysis in cancer

Publications.Title: SinCHet: a MATLAB toolbox for single cell heterogeneity analysis in cancer

Name: SingleSplice
Description: Algorithm for detecting alternative splicing in a population of single cells.

Publications.Title: Robust detection of alternative splicing in a population of single cells

Name: singlet
Description: Single cell RNA-Seq analysis with quantitative phenotypes.

Name: SinQC
Description: A Method and Tool to Control Single-cell RNA-seq Data Quality.

Publications.Title: Quality control of single-cell RNA-seq by SinQC

Name: sircel
Description: Identify cell barcodes from single-cell genomics sequencing experiments

Preprints.Title: Barcode identification for single cell genomics

Name: slalom
Description: slalom is a scalable modelling framework for single-cell RNA-seq data that uses gene set annotations to dissect single-cell transcriptome heterogeneity.

Publications.Title: f-scLVM: scalable and versatile factor analysis for single-cell RNA-seq

Name: SLICE
Description: The SLICE (Single Cell Lineage Inference Using Cell Expression Similarity and Entropy) algorithm consists of two major steps: (1) measuring cell differentiation states based on the calculation of single cell entropy (scEntropy) and (2) predicting cell differentiation trajectories by ordering single cells according to their scEntropy-derived differentiation states.

Publications.Title: SLICE: determining cell differentiation and lineage based on single cell entropy

Name: SLICER
Description: Selective Locally linear Inference of Cellular Expression Relationships (SLICER) algorithm for inferring cell trajectories.

Publications.Title: SLICER: inferring branched, nonlinear cellular trajectories from single cell RNA-seq data

Name: slingshot
Description: Functions for identifying and characterizing continuous developmental trajectories in single-cell sequencing data.

Preprints.Title: Slingshot: Cell lineage and pseudotime inference for single-cell transcriptomics

Name: SoptSC
Description: SoptSC, a computational method for single cell data analysis.

Preprints.Title: Low-rank Similarity Matrix Optimization Identifies Subpopulation Structure and Orders Single Cells in Pseudotime

Name: SPADE
Description: Visualization and cellular hierarchy inference of single-cell data using SPADE.

Publications.Title: Extracting a cellular hierarchy from high-dimensional cytometry data with SPADE
Visualization and cellular hierarchy inference of single-cell data using SPADE

Name: SparseDC
Description: A sparse differential clustering algorithm for tracing cell type changes via single-cell RNA-sequencing data

Publications.Title: A sparse differential clustering algorithm for tracing cell type changes via single-cell RNA-sequencing data

Name: Splatter
Description: Splatter is a package for the simple simulation of single-cell RNA-seq count data.

Publications.Title: Splatter: simulation of single-cell RNA sequencing data

Preprints.Title: Splatter: Simulation Of Single-Cell RNA Sequencing Data

Name: SPRING
Description: SPRING is a collection of pre-processing scripts and a web browser-based tool for visualizing and interacting with high dimensional data.

Preprints.Title: SPRING: a kinetic interface for visualizing high dimensional single-cell expression data

Name: SSrGE
Description: This procedure aims to fit sparse linear models using a binary matrix (n_samples x n_SNV) as features matrix and a gene expression matrix (n_genes x n_samples) as response.

Preprints.Title: Using Single Nucleotide Variations in Single-Cell RNA-Seq to Identify Tumor Subpopulations and Genotype-phenotype Linkage

Name: StemID
Description: StemID is an algorithm for the derivation of cell lineage trees based on RaceID2 results and predicts multipotent cell identites.

Publications.Title: De Novo Prediction of Stem Cell Identity using Single-Cell Transcriptome Data

Name: STEMNET
Description: We first use hierarchical clustering to identify the most mature cell populations; we then use these populations as a training set to classify priming in the less mature populations.

Publications.Title: Human haematopoietic stem cell lineage commitment is a continuous process

Name: switchde
Description: Differential expression analysis across pseudotime. Identify genes that exhibit switch-like up or down regulation along single-cell trajectories along with where in the trajectory the regulation occurs.

Publications.Title: switchde: inference of switch-like differential expression along single-cell trajectories

Name: SWNE
Description: Similarity Weighted Nonnegative Embedding (SWNE), is a method for visualizing high dimensional datasets.

Preprints.Title: Visualizing single-cell RNA-seq datasets with Similarity Weighted Nonnegative Embedding

Name: TASC
Description: TASC (Toolkit for Analysis of Single Cell RNA-seq), an empirical Bayes approach to reliably model the cell-specific dropout rates and amplification bias by use of external RNA spike-ins.

Publications.Title: Accounting for technical noise in differential expression analysis of single-cell RNA sequencing data

Preprints.Title: Accounting For Technical Noise In Single-Cell RNA Sequencing Analysis

Name: TASIC
Description: TASIC uses a Hidden Markov Model (HMM) based on a probabilistic Kalman Filter approach to combine time and expression information for determining the branching process associated with time series single cell studies.

Publications.Title: TASIC: determining branching models from time series single cell data

Name: topslam
Description: Extracting and using probabilistic Waddington's landscape recreation from single cell gene expression measurements.

Preprints.Title: Topslam: Waddington Landscape Recovery for Single Cell Experiments

Name: TraCeR
Description: TraCeR - reconstruction of T cell receptor sequences from single-cell RNA-seq data.

Publications.Title: T cell fate and clonality inference from single-cell transcriptomes

Name: TRAPeS
Description: TRAPeS (TCR Reconstruction Algorithm for Paired-End Single-cell),  software for reconstruction of T cell receptors (TCR) using short, paired-end single-cell RNA-sequencing.

Publications.Title: Targeted reconstruction of T cell receptor sequence from single cell RNA-seq links CDR3 length to T cell differentiation state

Name: TSCAN
Description: Pseudo-time reconstruction and evaluation in single-cell RNA-seq analysis.

Publications.Title: TSCAN: Pseudo-time reconstruction and evaluation in single-cell RNA-seq analysis

Name: UMI-tools
Description: This repository contains tools for dealing with Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMIs)/Random Molecular Tags (RMTs).

Publications.Title: UMI-tools: modeling sequencing errors in Unique Molecular Identifiers to improve quantification accuracy

Preprints.Title: UMI-tools: Modelling sequencing errors in Unique Molecular Identifiers to improve quantification accuracy

Name: umis
Description: umis provides tools for estimating expression in RNA-Seq data which performs sequencing of end tags of trancsript, and incorporate molecular tags to correct for amplification bias.

Publications.Title: Power analysis of single-cell RNA-sequencing experiments

Preprints.Title: Power Analysis of Single Cell RNAâ€Sequencing Experiments

Name: UNCURL
Description: UNCURL is an unified framework for unsupervised / semi-supervised learning using Single Cell RNA-Seq data.

Preprints.Title: Scalable preprocessing for sparse scRNA-seq data exploiting prior knowledge

Name: VAMF
Description: VAMF is a probabilistic dimension reduction method for single cell RNA-Seq datasets.

Preprints.Title: Varying-Censoring Aware Matrix Factorization for Single Cell RNA-Sequencing

Name: VASC
Description: Variational autoencoder for single cell RNA-seq datasets

Preprints.Title: VASC: dimension reduction and visualization of single cell RNA sequencing data by deep variational autoencoder

Name: VDJPuzzle
Description: TCR and BCR reconstruction from scRNA-seq data

Preprints.Title: B-cell receptor reconstruction from single-cell RNA-seq with VDJPuzzle

Name: velocyto
Description: velocyto (velox + ÎºÏÏ„Î¿Ï‚, quick cell) is a package for the analysis of expression dynamics single cell RNA seq data, in particuar it allows the estimation of the RNA velocity of single cells.

Preprints.Title: RNA velocity in single cells

Name: visnormsc
Description: visnormsc is a Graphical User Interface (GUI) for normalization of single-cell RNA sequencing (RNA-seq) data.

Publications.Title: visnormsc: A Graphical User Interface to Normalize Single-cell RNA Sequencing Data

Name: WaveCrest
Description: WaveCrest is a statistical approach to reconstruct gene expression trajectory in single cell RNA-seq experiments with ordered conditions.

Publications.Title: Single-cell RNA-seq reveals novel regulators of human embryonic stem cell differentiation to definitive endoderm

Name: Wishbone
Description: Wishbone is an algorithm to align single cells from differentiation systems with bifurcating branches.

Publications.Title: Wishbone identifies bifurcating developmental trajectories from single-cell data

Name: ZIFA
Description: Zero-inflated dimensionality reduction algorithm for single-cell data.

Publications.Title: ZIFA: Dimensionality reduction for zero-inflated single-cell gene expression analysis

Name: ZINB-WaVE
Description: Zero-inflated Negative Binomial based Wanted Variation Extraction (ZINB-WaVE)

Publications.Title: A general and flexible method for signal extraction from single-cell RNA-seq data
Observation weights unlock bulk RNA-seq tools for zero inflation and single-cell applications

Preprints.Title: ZINB-WaVE: A general and flexible method for signal extraction from single-cell RNA-seq data
Observation weights to unlock bulk RNA-seq tools for zero inflation and single-cell applications

Name: zingeR
Description: zingeR: Zero-Inflated Negative binomial Gene Expression in R.

Preprints.Title: zingeR: unlocking RNA-seq tools for zero-inflation and single cell applications

Name: zUMIs
Description: zUMIs is a fast and flexible pipeline to process RNA-seq data with UMIs

Preprints.Title: zUMIs: A fast and flexible pipeline to process RNA sequencing data with UMIs
